REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the residency of an appointment of person as an assistant district attorney by a district attorney
Summary: Relates to the residency of an appointment of person as an assistant district attorney by a district attorney.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to the appointment of a person as an assistant district attorney by a district attorney
